text:
Hi everybody. I'm not a developers, I was asked to "build" a website and a couple of landing pages with HubSpot cms.
I'm quite stuck atm.. trying to understand how it works and to get things done.. anyone willing to help me figure out some basics please?

hey.
a:  dont stress out.  this slack is super active and will help you as much as possible
b:  I highly recommend walking through this course: <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers>
c:  dont stress out.  you got this.  once you go through that, you will have more specific questions and we will help you get through it!
